description:
When his ship gets impounded, Dandy embarks on a road trip with a mysterious alien girl who has the power to trap his consciousness in the body of a stuffed space penguin.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Merry Companion Is a Wagon in Space, Baby
Mieux vaut être bien accompagné que seul, baby
Tabi wa Michizure Uchuu wa Nasake Jan yo
旅は道連れ宇宙は情けじゃんよ
